original: intros t1 t2 Hred k Hc. induction Hred. - intros j Hj v. simpl. intro Hc'. apply inversion_closed_TApp_1 in Hc. apply inversion_closed_TApp_2 in Hc. rewrite subst_TApp. apply IHHred in Hc. + apply closed_subst_invariant with (j:=j) in Hc'. * apply closed_increment in Hc'. apply IHHred in Hc; auto. * auto. + omega. - intros j Hj v. simpl. intro Hc'. apply inversion_closed_TAbs in Hc. apply inversion_closed_TAbs in Hc'. apply IHHred in Hc; auto. - intros j Hj v. simpl. intro Hc'. apply inversion_closed_TApp_1 in Hc. apply inversion_closed_TApp_2 in Hc. apply red_weakening in Hred. simpl in Hred. apply IHHred in Hc; auto. - intros j Hj v. simpl. intro Hc'. apply inversion_closed_TApp_2 in Hc. apply IHHred in Hc; auto.
